name: Untitled Note Game
description:
one day an evil shadow has taken over the island. how note will save his friends and his tranquility of course

This is a project that i made for fun and maybe i will turn it on a game

__-------------------------------------------------__-------------------------------------------------__

°PCcontrols: A to confirm _ SHIFT to slither _ Z to jump (double tap to double jump) _ Arrow Keys to move

°GamePadcontrols: A to jump (double tap to double jump) _ X to slither _ LeftAnalog to move

°FilterSettings: Q to normal filter, E to grayscale filter, R to sepia filter
